source: Curated catalog of accessibility research datasets

fields.metadata.created_at: ISO 8601 timestamp when the index was created
fields.categories: Dictionary of dataset categories, each containing:
fields.categories.*.datasets[]: Array of dataset entries within the category
fields.categories.*.datasets[].name: Dataset name
fields.categories.*.datasets[].url: URL to the dataset homepage or access point

notes: Curated reference catalog of 15 accessibility research datasets organized by category (speech_disorders, sign_language, aac, visual_accessibility, etc.). This file is an index/catalog, not raw data -- it describes external datasets available for research. Includes datasets like TORGO, WLASL, VizWiz, Speech Accessibility Project, and others.
